text: Ezɨ Joas kamaghɨn gumazir an ataribar akam ikaragha ghaze, “Ia asem Balɨn akurvaghasa na gimobi? Gumazir manam asem Balɨn akurvaghasa na dosi, aruem tɨghar anangamin dughiamɨn an a aremegham. Ofa gamir dakozir me dɨpɨrizir kam, kar Balɨn ofa gamir dakozim. Kamaghɨn, Bal guizbangɨra god, a uabɨ uabɨn akuragh.”
